lines.text: "That's mixed together with a few other sugars and a bit of a special fruit. Honestly, I think it "tastes pretty shitty, but it's what he likes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to give it a go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right then! Five gold." He goes and makes the drink for you again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Slowly but surely marking little amounts off this party fund, y'all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Need to make some more money.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a very strange mixture.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like brushing your teeth, only you get drunk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, kind of. In fact, elements of it taste like having orange juice after brushing your teeth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Foul.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's a little rough at times.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are you learning about the man by what he drinks?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm learning that he probably has minty fresh breath.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe you should cheers him from afar so he can see you're drinking it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but mine's in an ugly cup.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They didn't give you the same cup?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have nice cups. Do you want a jewel-encrusted chalice?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pull it out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm like fucking Bed, Bath, and Beyond in this bitch. Jewel-encrusted chalice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you really have a jewel-encrusted-- you do, in your fucking Bag of Holding?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not anymore, it's getting marked off now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sweet. I'm going to clean that shit out, pour it in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a little weird in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a silver and pewter chalice that contains a number of multi-colored gems embedded along the sides, going to the base.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is gorgeous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lil' Jon would be proud. It's beautiful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Taryon. You drink out of this one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That drink?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you're the one that bought him the drink. Look like you're drinking it, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Pinky out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How is it? Do you like it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I love it. (whispers) It's terrible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll just laugh, way too loud. (laughs) And then she said to me, that's not armor!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seems like most of the folks here come here fairly often at the end of the day, whether to go about their business or to unwind. But no one seems to be approaching you, no one's crossing your path.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so bored.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I go over and talk to Wence one more time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. You catch his attention. He comes back to the table as you step up and start in his direction, he goes, "Hey. Another round, eh?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Actually, no. I give him five gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. You want another one?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'd rather not. No, I was just wondering, do you know how long Korshad usually hangs out here every night?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Varies. Easily probably another hour or so."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Always with the same company, or different people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Varies. They've been here most of the afternoon."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, wow. Would you mind going over to him and just letting him know that the gentleman who bought him the drink would love a moment of his time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, all right."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Taryon Darrington. He needs to know the name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay. I will." He looks at the gold and goes, "All right. I will."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No rush. But make sure it happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Walks over. Do you go back to your table to join your compatriots? Okay. As you're watching, he actually has to psych himself up. He approaches and then turns around and stops for a second, and goes up to the table again and stops himself and gets the gumption up this time and goes to the table. And you see him talking to Korshad, who at this point has his hand on the tip of the drink, glances up at him. Looks over at the table again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk over and put my hand on Taryon's shoulder and keep eye-contact with Korshad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a smile creep slowly across Korshad's face. Puts his hand up and immediately you can watch as Wence, who's in the middle of talking and expressing this goes, "Yes." And quickly darts away. Korshad gives a point to the rest of the guys and you watch his lips say, "Excuse me a moment." He stands up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Make some room. Grog, leave!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I scoot with Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We get up. I get up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I get up with Grog, too. Oh, I have to pee. Do you want to go pee?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Korshad's walking across the room, Vax, you do watch as all the individuals that are on the upper platform all watch him go through the room and are now seeing the table and where they are standing. The attention is very strongly on what is about to transpire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So far just eyes, though?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I start paying attention to the room as well, with Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grand Poobah, here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You said that over the earring?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was Liam.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's like a lip at the very edge that he keeps clasped with his fingers as it drifts there in front of him, and he occasionally sips from it that way as he walks towards you. Comes up to the edge of the table. "Do you mind if I sit here?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh please, join us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My man Wence tells me that you are requesting my presence."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. For the sake of this. I'm going to move my hands but just know my hands are here the whole time. Okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sure you're familiar with Taryon here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Taryon Darrington, of the Darrington family.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have not had the pleasure, but I know of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you are familiar with his father as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Quite."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've heard tell of recent situations with his family and you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we were hoping we could come to an agreement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What agreement do you have proposed?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I don't know if you've heard of Vox Machina?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We trade in a great many things. Information being one. And I am well aware of who you are."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm well aware that someone like you could find a good use for someone like us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are you offering your services?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Potentially. If it could help clear the Darrington name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have been letting this stew for a very, very "long time, so if you wish to make any sort of dent in this debt, "your task will have to be equally monumental."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know my family owes you quite a bit of money.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 230,000 gold. If we're hearing correctly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You are correct. For the time being."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And might I inquire, as it is my family's debt: what is the timetable on that? Will you be coming to collect anytime soon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But I will be possessing all of your belongings."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will they be in any physical danger?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. Not unless they put up a fight."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I don't know much about you, but I assume you would much rather have the cash than have to own property and manage it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Both have their uses."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So would the Darringtons simply work for you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, I will be taking over the farms, I will "be taking over the business, I will be taking over the estate. Most of the assets within, they will "become property of the Myriad."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, there. That's where I think we could come to an arrangement. We're not particularly invested in the power structure here. We're here for sentimental reasons. The estate and just enough property to maintain a modest comfortability. We don't really care what happens to the fortune so long as your family's taken care of.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I guess.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You keep your house, you keep your things, you keep a little bit of property to manage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do you think? I mean, they did make this bed. I'm suggesting to you that maybe it is not your job to save your family's power and allow them to keep going as the way they have. But just to give them enough that even if they-- that they can continue with reasonable means. Maybe not necessarily living the life that they were living before but living far more comfortably.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Even that would be a step up, but it seems like we would have to do something in order just to earn that much.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I imagine so. It's just, there's a difference between saving everything and saving enough to keep them comfortable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If I am to understand you correctly, you are willing to offer your service to us?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Possibly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And in exchange, we would still be taking the land-based assets from the Darrington name, "other than the estate and enough means to live comfortably."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sure we can take a look at the assets and come to a very, very reasonable arrangement. And you, in turn-- well, we could have a discussion about what that would be worth to you. I have no interest in making an arrangement that doesn't please you. We're only here, again, for sentimental reasons. We are not invested beyond that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "Comfortable living is a relative thing. To maintain my comfort of living, well, "your estate is but a drop in the bucket. But, and I mean no offense--" as he looks about the rest of you-- "Comfortable living for some of you, well, that could be as much as my drink would cost."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My family would require their main property and all residential rental property.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is not a deal. The residential and the farm territory is to become mine. I would leave "for them your estate and enough gold to live a comparably comfortable lifestyle than living on "the street for years to come. They could then strike out on their own, start a new fortune if "they wish. Perhaps land barony was not their strong suit. You seem to have found other "pursuits, maybe you could lead them in a new path."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And past that point, they would be in no debt to you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Past that point, and a task done in our favor by the famed Vox Machina. Maybe."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would they get to maintain possession of their personal property? Artwork, statues?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The rest is mine."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And what is this task?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ancient. Birthed improperly. But now seems to grow "more and more mad. We're at a loss, so we've put out a contract or two, but nothing has taken a "bite yet. If you were to go to this mine, find this entity that has ruined our mining operation "there, return with proof of its demise, and we confirm its destruction, "I will consider our task complete."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll also need some operating capital for this. It sounds dangerous, so we will take the job, but we will need to also charge a very reasonable fee, I think, on top of this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is entirely understood. And we will keep track of each fee, and we will deduct it from "the materials in the Darrington estate."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we take care of this for you, it does seem like a monumental task.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It may not be. But it would seem to be something of your skill set."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: From what we've learned, ancient beings tend to be quite powerful. We would ask that you don't slander the Darrington name. That when they stay in their estate, everyone believes they are still the Darringtons as they have always been.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would agree to that. I have no interests in your family's public image. I believe that "damage has been done well enough on your own."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Are you sure you don't have a cloak I could just enchant and then we could call it square?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckling) He takes another sip from his drink. "When all this is said and done, Taryon, "we'll be in contact. I think there is much business we could do in the future."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I suppose we have no choice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's always a choice, dear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You could marry the girl or we could go kill an ancient being.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm feeling pretty good about this one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we need to decide at this moment?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seems like we do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We will also need all of the information you have on this creature in the mines, and if you have anybody who has access to that--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The diviner would be wonderful to speak to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The information I have given you is what the diviner has found."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not going to ask you all to risk your lives for my shitty family, so I will pursue this matter on my own if I have to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good. Yeah. You're going to go by yourself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I would hire a couple of people to come with me, but if you'd like to accompany me, I'd be okay with that too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could watch you do it. That'd be pretty funny.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I mean, you've taught me a lot, so maybe I could do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think you're good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You won't find anybody as good as us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You are very skilled in hiring talented mercenaries. That might be your strongest suit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am one for two on that count.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're already one up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we vote on it then? Grog, do you want to go kill something big and scary?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike, are you drunk?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So that's what I think we should do. Yes. Yea. I vote yea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Twinsies?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Always have your back, dear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Vax isn't here. Hey Vax. You want to go help me save my family by risking our lives in almost certain death?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What does that entail?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take that as a yes. Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vax says yes, and so do I! Aye!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Science bro?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we've all risked our lives for each other at one point and another, so it's your turn, Tary. Welcome to the family.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cheers. This stuff burns.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And this whole conversation he's had his mouth covered, he takes his fingers away from his mouth and he takes the drink. "Do we have an accord?" Picks his drink up and clinks it. "Return "when the deed is done." Slaps the table and stands up and walks back. And at this point, that you notice, the tables nearby, everyone's been just quietly watching in on this. As soon as he leaves they go back to their business and drinking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everyone, on the count of three, we're going to stand up very quickly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why? Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait! No, I'm just fucking with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Three! Let's go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you do that, about half the folks get startled by it. The music's still going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On the way out, can I grab Wence again, one last time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hey."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Most of the people here, are they local patrons or do they come from all over?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Most of them are local and come from all over."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sorry."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's all I needed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I just serve the drinks, miss."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I make my way back over to the players?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. She's sitting there. (drumming)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I have your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (drumming)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (louder) Can I have your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As she's still drumming her head slowly turns around and she goes, "Camilla." (drumming)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, and I leave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All right. With that, we're going to take a break. Try and get back here in a minute guys, see this next bit of interesting fun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To Camilla!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Come on over, jump into the Twitch chat to enter for the possibility to win this, the word for the night is Myriad. That is M-Y-R-I-A-D. If you don't know, look it up on Google.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You'll win it if you spell it right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone. Welcome back to Critical Role. Which, timing works out interesting sometimes. Yeah, welcome back to the game. We had our break. Going to go ahead and jump in here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel cheated. I didn't hear any of that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (belches)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys have found your way out of what seems to be this strange subterranean bar beneath the Grumpy Lily, you've agreed to, at least for the time being, to make your way east to this mine, which currently seems to be under the-- what's it called? The Platinum Mines of Herethis. Herethis. Which you, Taryon, you understand. Herethis is a region, a regional forest area over there. The Herethis Wood. About 120 miles east. You guys decide: What's your best means of travel? How do you intend to get there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have to misty there, right? Because you don't know any trees in the area?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could scry on the area if I knew enough about it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we misty there we could also camp for the night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we need to camp because we need to rest and get our shit back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's fine. It's 120 miles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not terribly far, as the mist flies.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep. I'm pretty fresh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can misty there, camp for the night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Character voice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, I'll go ahead and by the way, because I totally forgot. We do have a winner in the chatroom. Besolis8926, you won the giveaway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You got the Nutter Butter box!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Denova will contact you for your information to get it shipped to you, so congratulations. All right, so. What are you thinking about for travel? You're just doing the Wind Walk?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, before we leave, is there any type of research we should potentially do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what we'd be researching. The guy who sent us on the mission doesn't even know what it is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not even nearby, so it's not like we could ask people what the mine is like. It's 120 miles away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The mines of "hear this."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Herethis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is right up our alley. Like this is literally what we've been training for our whole lives.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, just in case there's maybe some ancient deity that rules over the forest of Herethis and some sort of goddess? Fuck it, let's go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, do we know anything? Have we ever heard about the woods of Herethis or the Platinum Mines of Herethis?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys haven't. You have. They're woods that lead into this small rocky-- it's almost too small to be a mountain range and more just large, rocky hills. But there's no historical significance to the location that you know of. Go ahead and make a history check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll high.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah! 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. You do know a number of the large-scale battles that took place towards the end of the Age of Arcanum took place on Wildmount. In fact, Zorhaus, the other kingdom that we were discussing before is largely a badlands, barren landscape because that was where the final battle between the Betrayer Gods and the Prime Deities took place. And the sheer volume of, the sheer intensity of that battle laid waste to the landscape there, so you have the Dwendalian Empire and the whole western side of Wildmount, which is fairly lush and functional, then towards the Zorhaus Kingdom is, and that whole eastern side of the continent, a lot of it is just barren, cracked, destroyed. But you do know that Herethis, the name, at least, stems from a hero that fell in a battle long ago. You can't recall the specific details of it, but there is some significance to the title or at least the location there to something ancient and old. May have to deal with this time period of entities battling gods. That's the best you can make out. The mines are well known. The Platinum Mines are well known. They're not well attended. They're not a public space, and they're definitely under the control of a number of companies that are shadow corporations under the control of the Myriad. You can see where the connection and the necessity for it to be reopened again is important. Platinum is not a very common metal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anything we should be worried about?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gods attacking us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Trial run.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man. No, but really, that's where the battles took place, huh? So this ancient being could be from, potentially--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or it could not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whatever it is, it's not leaving the mine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're running off on a lark, but we've raked ourselves in the faces before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! If we die, we die.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god, I don't want to die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, no one wants to die.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, once again--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't say it, Keyleth. Do not fucking say it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't incant that shit again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't say it about all of us and doom us to your fate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Goldfish.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Better.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before we go, was there something you wanted to tell the drow woman?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we're talking about what we were talking about before, I don't think it's a good idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you want to go and find him, us, and say hi, that's a different story.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would like to point out that this same person you are so adamantly protecting from our scrying or our spying or our finding is the same person who shit in the middle of a temple so that he could watch Pike.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not exactly the same thing, dear. But if you want to go with me and find him and check in and say hello, I'd be very happy to do that with you. But to send the woman who threw our friend, drugged, over the back of a horse, and took him off to his family? I don't really want to send her after Scanlan, to look in on him or follow him or watch him or anything him. It didn't sound like his father wanted him dragged back on the back of a horse, and it happened anyway. She doesn't seem very trustworthy to me. Yeah, she's cool. So what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just realized I have the other half of the stone. The traveling stone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That we gave Scanlan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could pop in on him anytime I want.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or he could pop in on you anytime.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But he hasn't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If he has it, still.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, maybe he threw it into the ocean for all we know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, that would suck because then we'd be in the ocean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would be really, really shit if he did that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It would be a massively dickish move.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was very smart, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, that happened.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In your face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. Anyway, my point still stands. Once we wrap up here if you want to go find him I will go with you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And do what? Convince him to come back?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See if he's okay? Ask him how his year's been?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about just a location and she has to stay unseen? You know, I know Keyleth can scry and stuff but--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could make her walk first into the mines.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you didn't want me to even scry on him and now we're talking about just popping in on him? I feel like there's a weird crossing of the lines.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but that was a year ago. I'm over that sentiment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh man, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guilted me very hard on that. You made me feel kind of shitty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is Grog evolved.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, you kind of got it right. Just go with it.

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: Exalted?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Absorbed. Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You done been woked.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Woked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So woked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but seriously. What are we doing? I don't think we use that mercenary to walk into a mine. I'm not sending her to her death.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am perfectly content to hold onto that chit for as long as we need.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Save that for a rainy day. We don't need to punch that ticket now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we at least ask her to stay in town? For a to-be-determined mission later?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I think she needs to keep up her employment, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can give her a little money to keep around, a retainer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can give her a little money. I might need her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She was employed. She's reachable through employment. We can just find out how to reach her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yeah, that one!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She might be gone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have to be able to hire her. I'm sure there's a system.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have no idea how she was hired in the first place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We go ask her how to hire her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, well then let's do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And no one has heard from him at all over the course of the year?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Well, he writes me all the time, but outside of that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? Really?! Scanlan does?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's messing with you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was very mean.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You promised you'd keep that secret.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She has a mean streak.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) I have so many secrets to keep, dear. So many.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm mad for an (stutters) a long time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know one of them. When she farts it sounds like a duck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It really does.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's kind of cute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We go find-- (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to fart awkwardly and we're going to yell "imposter!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You returned. So what did you need?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have no mission at this moment, but we may call on you shortly after we return.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we find you here or will you be gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I generally prefer to stay around Vashlow."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where's that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Vashlow? It's to the west of here. About 25 miles southeast of Port Demali."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Port Demali.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you wish to contact me, you can send a missive to Vashlow, or if you have access to a "practitioner of the arcane arts, perhaps a Sending would be sufficient."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sending, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Definitely.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you for your time, and we'll be in touch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. It was just business."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry about your horse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Until we meet again." She nods and then walks out into the darkness of the night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so what are you guys doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's Misty Step. Let's Wind Walk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Misty Step tonight and then that way we can recover everything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In the morning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, what time is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're in the evening now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's Misty Step there--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Misty Step is a very different spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to be windtalkers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There appear to be large ropes and cables fastened at the edges of what looks to be a large circular ravine, some sort of an entry port, a very large hole in the ground. And as you approach and get close you can see that, while there are two standing towers, there appear to be remnants of two other towers that have fallen in, and looking at some of the cables and the way that some of the equipment is set up, it appears that this sinkhole that he spoke of that consumed a portion of this entryway, whether it be a quake or something, a lot of the structure that was placed around the outside of the mine has fallen in, and is precariously being held either dangling over the inside by cable work or has crumpled somewhere at the bottom of this abyssal hole you see before you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you mean by--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When I say abyssal hole, that's just a descriptive way of saying it is pitch black from this distance. You cannot see anything past the top.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And it's connected to the Abyssal Plane.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is actually a doorway to the Abyss. Hey guys! Orcus tonight!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Finale!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we have any glow sticks that we could throw in and watch fall?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, we actually do.

lines.text: Have you guys transitioned back to your physical forms to have this conversation?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Well, we can float down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we're doing our little circle, I would say that a little bit of a distance.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.text: Cooties.

lines.text: Did you get it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, it's right here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dang it. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24. Okay, you start coasting over the edge, and you can see there are broken carts and crates. You can see the remains of what seem to be a couple of humanoid bodies, mostly picked away to the point where there's just slightly pinkish bone from whatever dried bits of muscle or blood that remain, the rest of the flesh and organs pulled from or dissolved. You're not sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think a Cure Wounds, a light Cure Wounds would probably help.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dead talk?

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.text: Oh yeah, you can do that!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We can talk to the dead. I have it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll land a little bit away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's land a little bit away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Getting some Baldur's Gate vibes here, man.

lines.text: So you land about half a mile out, and you guys transition back to your physical forms. Vax shares the information and what he spotted.

lines.text: Were the bodies on top or were the bodies down below?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On the edges, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They were on the edges.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And when you mean seared, like acid? Or like heat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like white and pink bone. Like just whatever flesh was on there has been picked off.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Like something was eating them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we speak to dead?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike can do that.

lines.text: Why don't you two misty there, somebody start setting up camp for tonight.

lines.text: I mean, land and then--

lines.text: So I do that.

lines.text: All right, so. Is it just you, Pike? Who's going with you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And me.

lines.text: I'm already standing by the bodies, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, you're still out there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I--

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to set up the tents.

lines.text: The skeleton's been picked clean.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. We only see the one body?

lines.text: There are three bodies around the whole exterior, but you've landed next to one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's fine. 18.

lines.text: Looking at the bones, you can see signs of what appear to be scratches or grooves across the bones... It's interesting. A lot of the bones have a very smooth texture to them. You're used to seeing very porous, but it looks like elements of the bones have melted slightly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, gods.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Slimes, jellies. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to get my broom ready. And while Pike is doing her ritual I'm just going to keep a hand on her, that if anything happens then I can just take off with her in tow.

lines.text: Okay. Pike, you're casting Speak with Dead?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. It's easy enough for you to cast it. It's quick. Ritual complete, you go ahead and you burn some incense.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I get three questions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And at which point, the skeleton, which is face down on the ground by the way, the skull (bone creaking) creaks up and looks over. Like, turns around and faces you as it reaches. It curls upward, almost in like an upward dog--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like downward dog? Oh. What's that called?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cobra position, but the head's turned completely around and curled up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I get down close to it and go (groans) and I flip it over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (rattling thud) It flips over on its back and the head (bone creaking) turns back around to its right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get five questions.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Five questions.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Five?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Good day, sir. It's not a good day for you. Sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's okay. Good start.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What happened to you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (raspy, strained) "Something in the mines we found. It hatched. Or woke. And its anger shook "the halls. I tried to run, but the skittering beasts got me first."

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Godzilla.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's more than one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) What did the skitterers look like?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What did the skittering beasts look like?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, in my drink?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It flew away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's a dick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pincers. Many legs."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (whispering) It's like spiders.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Umber hulk?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Umber hulk with many legs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That could be a glabrezu, which fucking killed you the first time. They have pincers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but that's really big.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. Skittering beasts?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is there anyone else alive?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did anything work against it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, yeah that's a good question. (louder) Was there anything that you guys could tell of your knowledge-- did anything seem to damage it or work against it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (grunts) He seems confused about what you're referring to. The skittering creature or the--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh. The skittering creature or the big thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The skittering creatures?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Both, because we still have--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Against them

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Against them! Against the skittering creatures

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The skittering creatures, we just ran. I didn't look to see."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's already three questions.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How big were the creatures?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They were rather large, maybe eight foot end to end. They burrow, they spit. But they were "awoken by the smaller one."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, he said they spit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did he say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the skitterers bite, they spit. But they were awakened by the smaller one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The smaller one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's the smaller one?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What can you tell us of the smaller one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They spit. Maybe acid, probably.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, they're smooth, that means they were just like (slurping noises).

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is there anything that you can tell us about the smaller one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It was like a baby, and it cried out and everything fell around us. I barely made it out, "but the skitterers found me." (deep exhale) The enchantment leaves that embodied the skull, falls to rest, the bones now motionless.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So it can emit a cry that shakes everything.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: A baby, like a baby?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mandrake?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say, Marisha--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it sound like anything we have encountered? A nature check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say a nature check for both you and Vex.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would I have an advantage with my little book?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not for this in particular.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It will be like the creature back in Stillben?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I don't think that's what it is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And we have heard tales of mandrakes, and they scream.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, did the pincers sound like something we have fought though, before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's not something you've encountered before, necessarily.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19, okay. And Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nature check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I get advantage because I'm standing in the woods? Six!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know you're standing in the woods.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have heard of a creature that does exist in subterranean and sometimes forested areas, referred to as an ankheg.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: An ankheg?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of the things this corpse has described makes you think of that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Isn't that what our bug juice is made out of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You bug juice is made of sandkheg, which is a desert-based variant of that creature.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. I wonder if we could sprinkle it around us and they won't bother us because we'll smell like their brethren.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I ain't wasting that shit!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, man, it's an idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So they snatch cattle--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we should all be cows.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, you guys. Perfect opportunity!

lines.name: LIAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Throwback Thursday!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If only the person who could cast the spell was in your party anymore. He's elsewhere in the world right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That asshole.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so what are you guys doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we're going to rest for the night, and then go in at first light.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, we definitely should have a Heroes' Feast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, let's have a Heroes' Feast, which-- okay, hang on, let me check here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't need it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can do a Heroes' Feast.
