lines.text: Can I get out of it if I'm buried in soil, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Freedom of Movement. I'll say it doesn't have--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's why I cast it on him, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You parkour around the rocks as they try and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the effect. He didn't avoid the burying. So I guess you'd just, if you want to use your action to try to escape, you do so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could enlarge, maybe. You can enlarge and come up out of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That ends that go. Taryon, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't know, do we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it wearing a diaper, or is its dangly bits hanging out?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is a peeper hanging out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it naked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've got a pretty close look, if you wanted to take a moment to inspect.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a boy!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're trying to kill this thing, yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess I'll punch a baby. It's going to miss, though. That's a slippery baby, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At 60 feet of movement, you're not quite within melee range of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I was going to use my Ring of the Ram.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that'll do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I'm probably not going to hit, because it's got an amazing AC.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got any Luck left?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: See what happens.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got to do something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this going to be a long fight? I'll do all three charges of the Ring of the Ram, and punch a baby.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and roll for an attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eight. Not good enough, I'll use Luck. 13 plus nine? 22.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait! Can I War God's Blessing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range on War God's Blessing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's see. 30 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he's out of range for that, unfortunately. Sorry!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wanted that baby to be punched so bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (crash)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One day, it's going to be epic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It worked once.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It got you a kill. The marid.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That little baby just Zatoichi-ed out of the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you're just like, (ring firing). No effect. It dodges out of the way. And now you can see its weird, lifeless white eyes turn towards you once more.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That end your turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Let's see here. It's going to go ahead and use another ability now. As it sees that you're closed in, it glances over, and you watch as suddenly, a bunch of stonework just (rushing noise) up in the center of the area, as now--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, fuck. One of these guys. What? A wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A giant stone wall suddenly shoots up above to about 40 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We got this, guys. Don't worry. Me and Grog got it. Me and buried-Grog and buried-Keyleth, we got this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, you're buried, too?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, you are and Grog is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm under the wall, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're underneath right over here. You're on the outskirts of the wall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's just me and the baby right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you and the baby, and an air elemental, and a giant sword that's swinging.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, my air elemental is there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, great. I'm fine, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you lose vision entirely, Pike. Just (rushing noise) wall's in front of you. Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So is the wall hitting the roof?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the wall would have to go way high. It's about 40 feet up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to run up to the top of that wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you only move 30 feet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How far will my movement get me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It'll get you about there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Parkour!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like some unmotivated Spider-Man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In that case-- oh fuck, I've got nothing I can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll put you right there to remind us, but you're almost at the top of the wall at your full movement.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, then I will burn my action to dash up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You get to the top of the wall, there, and you can now see it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I assume I can get part of the way down the wall as well with my action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get partway down the wall, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, so I just want to start making my way, I'm going Spider-man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you get about, I'll say, there on the opposite side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was definitely irritating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your turn, Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That, and I'm going to cast Hex on that little baby. And he has disadvantage on, let's make it his wisdom checks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. At the end of your turn, Percy. Let's see, it's going to go ahead and use--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a lot of actions, this creature.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I haven't actually technically attacked it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know what I want to do. You tell me what I can do. First thing I want to do is cast Bless on-- I grab Vex, cast Bless on us and Pike, I have a range of 30 feet on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't want to do that. I fly straight at Pike and I'm going to lift her up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you immediately take eight points of fire damage by getting close to the flames to grab her. It's like (fire noises).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure. And then is it an action to grab and an action to lift and carry over?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say it would be an action to grab her enough, and you're going to move at half speed with her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which is still a ton at this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And that's all I need is the action to grab her and movement to go over?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Action, and your movement there was about there, I'd say you'll get your action and your movement will get you to up above the wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Action and movement will. All right, then I will leave her on top of the wall, and I will use my bonus action to fly within range of baby, and I should have one action left, yeah? Action, action, bonus action, hasted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Hold on, no. You used an action to pick up Pike. You brought her up there, you moved, you have another action and a bonus action. You have an action and a bonus action. But the extra action that you have is from your haste, which means it can be used for either a melee attack or ranged.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Great. So the bonus action I will use to dash towards baby. And my final, hasted attack action, I will stay 30 feet away from the baby, though, in the air, and I will throw Whisper with my last, hasted action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. There you go. Put you down there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And that's a 25, which hits, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. That just hits, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One, and can I dump Smite into this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you'd like to, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to. There's nine plus psychic damage is 16 plus-- 20, 26, and here comes the sneak attack damage, 26, 27, 29, 30, 33, 37, 43, 47.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turns back towards you, and gives another scream as the dagger returns to you. End of your turn?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the end of my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, at the end of your turn, it's going to use its last legendary action. It's going to use another cold snap. You feel the air around you, familiar, (whoosh) condense, and the ice cling to you. The air in your lungs freezes solid, it seems. Go ahead and roll a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Going to use another Luck. 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're at the top of the wall now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right. If I climb down there, it's an athletics thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, okay. I'll climb down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's going to be a long climb.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, is it really? Is it fucking really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a natural one?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who put her on the top of a 40 foot wall?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just picked her up and dropped her there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She can see and cast spells!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have Feather Fall with my shield.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. So you use your reaction to cast Feather Fall on yourself as you stumble off the side, and as you plummet about 20 or so of the 40 feet (whoosh, soft impact) and you land unscathed on the ground.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Is that just my action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your reaction to do that. With the shield.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. How close am I to the baby? Can I get to the baby?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not physically. It's over here and you're at the base of the wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like 50 feet.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get within range to it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So you know what? I'm going to (sings) Guiding Bolt the baby!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, what level?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's do five. 5th-level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, shit, okay. Go ahead and roll for an attack on that. Wait, is Guiding Bolt an attack? No, is it a saving throw? I think it's a saving throw, isn't it? I always forget that. No, it's a ranged spell attack, so you have to roll to hit it. Go ahead and roll a d20 and add your spell attack modifier.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's not enough I don't think. 19? I will use Guided Strike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you can do that! Guided Strike, you get to add that to your own attack?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Channel Divinity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, plus ten to the roll. That'll do it. 29, boom. Go ahead and roll damage on that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How many sixes? Let's see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well it's four levels above that, so it's 8d6 radiant damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 18. Oh, wow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You rolled a lot of sixes!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She rolled six sixes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six sixes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She rolled a ton of sixes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 42 points?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm looking at them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're all sixes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We choose to kill this celestial baby not because it is easy, but because it is hard!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you land gently on the ground after plummeting head over heels. (thuds, fire blast) Holding your holy symbol before you, you watch as this beam of condensed divine energy rockets across, and this tiny, floating, withered planar baby (fire blast) gets blasted. You watch as the wings get pushed back. It's holding itself in place, but you see the dark shadow outline as the energy is blasting through it. As it hits, its wings recoil, and it's still floating there, but you can see this sparkly outline of divine energy, because the next attack on it has advantage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do I still have a bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. Your sword's still up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll use the spiritual weapon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spiritual weapon, you can move 20 feet as a bonus action. It moves up and takes a swipe. Go ahead and roll an attack.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, the hook on the top there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's how she fell off the wall.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ooh. That's a 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29 hits! Yeah, so go ahead and roll the damage for the spiritual weapon, which is 1d8 plus five, I think, for you. Whatever your wisdom modifier is.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, that's not a lot. Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of damage. It all helps. All righty. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm underground, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're underground, you are restrained, you are blind. You cannot see anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (growls) I'm going to go earth elemental.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm amazed he didn't already have it out of the bag.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that ability, you get an earthglide, and this is a non-issue for you. All righty, Keyleth. So you are an earth elemental.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I have enough movement to earthglide to them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your speed?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think 60, earthglide?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 60, earthglide? Yeah, totally. You're moving into melee with the baby?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, can I come up from underground, grab them, and then beat them into the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Go ahead and roll a slam attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Puny god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make two slam attacks, so roll twice. It's plus eight to attack each time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's cocked. Natural 20 on that one, and a four on a second one, which is 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you reach up out of the ground from underneath, (impact noise) your fingers clasp around the celestial baby and (whack) slam it into the ground as hard as you can. Go ahead and roll damage on that. 2d8 plus five, so roll the 2d8.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then you double the 2d8.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You double whatever you rol for the 2d8 and then add plus five. Crit that baby. It's our next t-shirt: Crit that baby!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Six doubled, which is 12, plus five doubled, which is ten, so that's 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bonus isn't doubled. Just the dice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's great. 27 points of damage. (wham) Slamming onto the ground. As your hand retracts up, you can see the wings are-- as it starts to fly up, it (gasps).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I just want to hold onto it and be like, yo! Yo, air elemental! And then let my air elemental come over and do its thing. Double slam attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Slam attack. No, I'm going to do a multi attack. Two slam attacks. So 2d8 plus eight, once again. That's an 18 and a 17. Plus eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 and 17 plus eight?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, so 26 and 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For the first one, 15 plus two. 17. And then the second one is eight, plus two fives, which is 18 plus two, so 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And he gets flung in a random direction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, this was just hitting it. (impacts) All righty. That's the end of your turn? All right. As it comes back to the entity's turn, it's looking really, really rough. And as part of that, it's going to reach into itself. Its hands push into its torso, and as it screams, (raspy scream) it gives out this horrible scream as it tears some of its chest open, and from the inside, where you imagine it would be a ribcage, it's this impossibly bright light that echoes out in a shockwave, affecting everybody except for Vex, actually. I need everybody else to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy. That don't look good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't have advantage on this, do we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to burn a Resolve.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Constitution: that's part of my physical stats as being an elemental, correct? It's con, strength, and dex. Never mind. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22. That succeeds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That succeeds. Pike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Succeeds. Everyone who succeeds, you suffer 48 points of radiant damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Radiant damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 48 on a success. Whoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you failed, you took 96 points of radiant damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The cloak wouldn't--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cloak doesn't say a spell effect?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Against spells and other magical effects.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, because it's not a leveled spell, it's just a radiant blast, it would not affect it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It wouldn't have given me advantage on that save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it wouldn't.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 96, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 96 points of radiant damage. So Keyleth, I need you-- your elemental has gone berserk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's no way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aside of rolling a 20. Go for it. Just try.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Unless I roll a nat 20? They just do their own thing if you fail.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you got to roll, a 20? Percy, bless that shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Even so, I'm letting you have this opportunity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. So as the Conjure Elemental spell fails, the control of your elemental shifts, and now it's aggressively turning its attention towards you and the rest of your party.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I not fade it after this? Oh, I can drop concentration on it and then it will go away, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. That's not how this works.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you just put--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A new enemy on the map.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A new opponent enters.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To be fair, didn't it also get affected by the blast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, actually. Roll a constitution saving throw for the air elemental. It's a plus two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled a 13, plus two, so 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The air elemental is actually destroyed. To your advantage, strangely.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It only has 90 hit points, so it's fine, guys! It's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so the entity looks like it's barely hanging on, and you see parts of its internal body falling out from where it tore its chest open. It's going to use a bonus action to Misty Step out of this vicinity over to here. It's going to use its movement to fly high up, almost trying to escape the cavern now. It's up in that region right there. We'll say, here. On top of this. Turn that away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, look how teeny! I can finally see it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Above a fountain.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a faerie dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's so teeny.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I'll fly up so I can see over the wall. I have no idea what's going on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You fly up and you see everyone below is wrecked, the ground is charred with some sort of a radiant blast. You watched it flash over the wall itself, like a small, rapid recreation of the intro of Akira. (boom) This big, arcing ball of white energy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow. Can I Hunter's Mark the baby?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I'm going to try to shoot the baby with my Blazing Bowstring. That would be a 30. And I'm going to make it a bramble shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ball of vines in the air.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: DC of 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strength?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I actually rolled a natural 17.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Motherfucker. Okay, well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it still takes the damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Still 4d8 extra. Well. 17, plus five is 22, plus eight is 30, plus two is 32, plus 1d6 lightning damage... 35, plus 1d6 for Hunter's Mark is 40.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 40, nice! So as it hits, you watch as the brambles try and wrap around it, but it actually flies free.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait! Plus the blazing bowstring, another two fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's on the edge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to try to do the same thing again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With a Blazing Bowstring again. 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, bramble shot again, because I get two, motherfucker! That's ten for my Blazing Bowstring. Oh, Jesus H. Macy. 19, plus five is 24, plus eight is 32, 36. Oh my god, 34. 38, plus ten is 48.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Frozen no more! Freeze me at your peril!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I just shoot the baby.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it reaches over to try and pull the arrow out, and it begins to, suddenly the arrow (whoosh) breaks into a bunch of bramble vines that begin to wrap around it, and you watch as the tiny baby arm and wing try and reach out (choking) as it constricts and twists and slowly constrains it until you see it (crack) pop and go limp on the inside of the vines. And as the vines unfurl, what was physically there is slowly dissipating into a glitter-like powder. The body dissipating and falling apart.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, it was an evil baby, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, nobody likes glitter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, glitter gets everywhere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we get out of here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (muffled) I don't mean to be rude!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where is he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know, actually.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I saw it. I'll point down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You point. I earthglide and I find him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I beat him out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have enough constitution to be fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't want to kill him by suffocating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he's fine. He can hold his breath for six minutes. He's got a really high constitution, so you're fine. You slowly pummel the rock out from his way and pull Grog out from the interior of the stone floor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we should head out and bug bomb the place.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't we need proof?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grab the body. Let's go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's no body!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go over to the glitter and I get some of my potion bottles from my alchemy to-- Oh, I'm actually good at this. I try and harvest some, sweep some glitter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you gather some glitter in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really quick, just look around, is there anything of value to grab before we run?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll look, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While she's doing that, can I just look over the ground and see if there's any platinum deposits?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could do a quick mining.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, there are a number of visible edges of veins.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there 230,000 gold worth?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Probably. We could stay here for a couple months.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In this whole mine, there's a lot of platinum, but you have to mine it. And as you guys are having this moment, you begin to hear the loud sound of hundreds of large insect-like creatures climbing their way down the walls.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god. Get to the middle and get in the air.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is everyone ready?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I need help.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We pulled you out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you mean, you need help?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm on the other side of the 40-foot wall from the carpet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go (boom) and I pull Grog through.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, the carpet. We just got to get the carpet. I can go down and grab the carpet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, the carpet. I take a few minutes as my earth elemental self to beast through...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't have a few minutes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can do double damage to structures.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't have to do that. I can go get the carpet. I'm right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, okay. Go get the carpet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you guys begin to make your way back up through.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we bamfing out or are we flying up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we're flying up and if we see anything we'll just take shots at anything that's rolling around, if anything is visible. Let's just do damage on our way out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, we're doing damage as we fly out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or we could Tree Stride out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can't Tree Stride. There's no trees.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or we can Plane Shift.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a small tree growing out of the side of the wall from where you killed the creature, but it's not large enough for that spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But still really cool!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it grows and twists out, like a bonsai curves upward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hope that it slowly becomes a forest underground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're going to chop it down as they mine the platinum.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys are coasting up through the shaft?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, are we just riding up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Straight up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Broom and carpet? Broom and carpet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys begin heading up through the center column of this opening. As you're moving up, are you staying in the darkness?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you Daylight or something, like up and out?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can. Do we need to?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know, at this point, it might be.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On the top of my spire I cast Daylight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So (boom) this light now emerges from this area, and as you can see now through this cavern around you, there's about a dozen or so of these large ankheg creatures, about every 30 feet or so, 40 feet up. You're in the center of-- you look up and you can see easily the hundred that you saw earlier have all been drawn to the surface by the screams of this creature. And as you begin rocketing up with this Daylight spell, you watch as some of them start hanging upward in your direction. You start hearing this sound, (hiss).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are they attracted to the Daylight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're apparently attracted to your presence. It is a line shot. I'm going to go ahead and have, let's see here. Percy and Vex, I need you guys to both make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit. Oh god, we did not-- pretty sure you said that last time, before you turned into Chef Boyardee.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, sorry, not constitution. Dexterity, my apologies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dexterity saving throw? That is so much better.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Should I reroll? Yeah, I'll reroll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should you reroll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, roll again; it's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you both make it. So you both suffer eight points of acid damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to start taking shots as high up as I can see, I want to start taking shots at these things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll do the same thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are over a hundred. And they take more than a few shots to go. We'll say you start picking them off, a few as you go, but you watch them fall past you. There's just such a mass number of them. As you guys get up another 40 or so feet, (spray sound) again. From three different ones. All right, I need Taryon, Percival, and Vex again to make dexterity saving throws.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT, TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll live with that. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, six points of acid damage to the three of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Halved to three for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way up even further. You're about halfway up this tunnel at this point and now you're getting to the heavy cluster of these creatures. At this point, a large cluster of them begin to spray all across. I need all of you guys to make two dexterity saving throws. Anybody get lower than a 13?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: ASHLEY, TRAVIS
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For the second one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lower than a 13?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. That would be all of you except for Pike and Grog take a total of 14 points of acid damage. Both of you guys, for the purposes of this, take 21 points of acid damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You okay there, Pikey-pants?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I'm fine!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax, Pike, and Grog. The three of you guys roll dexterity saving throws, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Six points of acid damage, six points of acid damage, 12 points of acid damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much further do we have to go up?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, with the brooms and the carpet, it's not super fast. Putting up there again. You get about three-quarters of the way up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is Pike riding on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's on the carpet.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm on the carpet. I'm okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should heal yourself!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do a Wind Wall to protect us from around us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wind Wall is stationary. It might help with one round of the spray.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we doing one more round?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll find out. You don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we are, I will prep my Wind Wall spell to encompass us for one more round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you guys are heading upward, now you're about three-quarters of the way out. The numbers are thinning a little bit. They start spraying once more. You go ahead and create a Wind Wall that you've been preparing. As you watch, these jets of extremely acidic burning liquid shoot toward you, suddenly a column of wind gets conjured upward from the darkness and deflects the spray into a mist that is thrown back against the wall harmlessly. You're almost to the exit, and you see a handful more towards the very top of this cavern. Keyleth, Percy, and Pike. Make a dexterity saving throw, if you can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pikey.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm good. 21.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to burn a reroll. It's the end of my resolves!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh! Natural 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That's eight points of acid damage. You took the--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The eight, yeah. As you guys just crest out of the top of the dark column below, you can watch as the creatures are starting to skitter out from the edges, but you are far above and a few of them are spraying, but you're above the range and it's coasting over and disappearing below. You've now emerged into the night sky, the moonlight above you. You're all fairly beaten.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there anything we can throw down there to really piss them off?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll drop a bead of Firewall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, and I can drop a Fireball on there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, a Wall of Fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to throw a Wall of Fire on the edge of it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, and I'll throw a Fireball. Burn the place down. Extermination.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bug bomb.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I spit in the hole.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was going to see if I could put a Blade Barrier on top of the hole, so once the fire's in there, they can't get out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the radius on Blade Barrier?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 90 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, we'll say as you come out the top, you throw down the Blade Barrier-- what's the radius of it, though?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't think it says.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll pull it up real fast.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, it does say.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 60 feet in diameter. No! You can make a straight wall of 100 feet or 60 feet in diameter.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, ringed wall up to 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you can make a wall around the one side of it. Not the whole thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wall of Fire around the other?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't get to get the whole radius, but between the Wall of Fire and the bladed wall, you blast the opening there. You coast away, watching and hearing as dozens of ankhegs that are climbing up to the top begin to (screeching). Eventually, they all begin to burrow back into the rock and stone and vanish. The ones on the surface begin to burrow below. And a calm stillness comes over the exterior of the mines. As you all coast up, hundreds of feet in the air over the forest, licking your wounds. So you removed the glitter and you removed--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The little coffin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The little stone placard. You had to wedge it out, but you got it up there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's where we'll call it for the night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was awesome!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm at 57 hit points. Yay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Add 100 to that and that's somewhere Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where were you at? I feared for you, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That cherub was a bitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aw man. That was also created by the chat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was it?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The baby was created by the chat?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why you do this to us, chat?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why you make us kill a baby? That was great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was a really cool villain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was a tiny celestial.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like beating up a Kewpie doll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Was the prospect of doing something that attacks via the terrain instead of--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Was he an evil baby?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, was it evil? Or could we have saved it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The actual title for it is Symphior the Withered Planetar. It was essentially a celestial seed that was placed to eventually emerge as a guardian in a future time, almost a Ragnarok-type circumstance. But the land around it became corrupted as it gestated or was held in stasis, and then was awoken prematurely. And as such, became this horrible monstrous version of what it was supposed to be. It was neutral, but it was dangerous. It seemed pretty far gone. Thank you guys so much. We'll be back next week with the battle royale. That'll be fun.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everybody kill Keyleth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Go for Keyleth to begin with. Try to kill her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am going to be looking at

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: These two have to be the first to go down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Why?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because loot drop.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we've got to get Hunger Games with this shit. Defend the cornucopia of loot!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going for the machete!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But Vex, you're my best friend!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you're my best friend. I won't kill you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay! Like, within five minutes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This one shoved my face into lava at the end of the last battle royale.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love you! (sizzling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was pretty good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then Pike did it to me immediately the next round. I love you! (sizzling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it was pretty slick. Exactly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, it was.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome. Thank you so much for watching. We'll be back next week, Thursday, with our battle royale. Hope you have a wonderful night and weekend. And is it Thursday yet? Good night! [music]
